product_name: The North Face T-Dubs Insulated Jacket - Men's
long_description: Built for freeriding, the stylish T-Dubs jacket from The North Face offers windproof, waterproof, insulated protection and comfort, whether you're hiking up the pipe or dropping in. Rugged HyVent(TM) 2-layer construction is waterproof, windproof and breathable; fully sealed seams prevent moisture from seeping through. Heatseeker(TM) polyester fiber insulation is strategically placed around your body to keep you warm without inhibiting movement. Zip chest pockets double as vents; dual-entry zip and flap handwarmer pockets; wrist pocket with goggles cloth; media pocket with external access; internal goggles pocket. Powder skirt with gripping elastic keeps snow out; snaps let you integrate the powder skirt with compatible pants by The North Face (sold separately). Cinch adjustable hem and rip-and-stick wrist cuffs help seal out cold air and retain valuable warmth; underarm vents let you control airflow and your comfort. Fully adjustable hood ensures a weather-blocking, personalized fit with unrestricted vision; hood can be secured to jacket so it doesn't flap around and cramp your style. Drawcord hem and rip-and-stick cuffs to help retain warmth; cuffs have thumbholes to help keep cuffs in place. The North Face T-Dubs insulated jacket has a relaxed fit with a roomy body and sleeves; jacket also features a longer body length for extra coverage.
short_description: Built for freeriding, the stylish T-Dubs jacket from The North Face offers windproof, waterproof, insulated protection and comfort, whether you're hiking up the pipe or dropping in.
